get.description:
Gets a list of records from report, limited to 250 records per request.
Only returns report field data.
Can iterate using $top and $skip

parameters.name: AppIdentifier
parameters.description: Identifier for the App, can be found in the app Url /App/{AppIdentifier} or /{AppIdentifier}

parameters.name: ReportID
parameters.description: Id of report

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skips records, setting to 1 will return the second record

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of records to return, max = 250

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description:
Field to order by
[fieldIdentifier] asc/desc
parameters.x-ms-summary: The field indentifier to order by in braces [FieldIdentifier]

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Provide an oData filter string to filter records by.
In the form
[fieldIdentifier] operation filterValue
Example
[textField] eq 'Text'

Operators allowed 
Eq	  Equal	                        /Suppliers?$filter=[City] eq 'Redmond'
Ne	  Not equal	                /Suppliers?$filter=[City] ne 'London'
Gt	  Greater than	                /Products?$filter=[Price] gt 20
Ge	  Greater than or equal	/Products?$filter=[Price] ge 10
Lt	  Less than	                /Products?$filter=[Price] lt 20
Le	  Less than or equal	        /Products?$filter=[Price] le 100
And	  Logical and	                /Products?$filter=[Price] le 200 and Price gt 3.5
